name: Horror House (itch) (JiroKonto)
description:
This is a portfolio piece I made in around four days and thought it would be amusing to create so that others could enjoy it. Caution, the sounds are a bit loud. This game is about playing from level to level and solving small puzzles.If you don't know what to do next, interact with the device at the beginning of the level and then check out the tip.

Credits: 3D assets were created by https://www.artstation.com/salomesartstudio
